price: Hapana ila kufa kwetu mara ya kwanza tu, wala sisi hatufufuliwi.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
footnotes: Hakika hawa wanao kadhibisha kufufuliwa bila ya shaka wanasema: Hapana kufa ila kwa haya haya mauti yetu ya kwanza ya duniani, wala sisi hatutafufuliwa tena.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimunsharīna
